name: Fire the Crier (Jasminezhang)
description:
[NYU Game Center Summer High School Program]

Programmer: Jasmine Z., Ishan D.

Artist: Christian W., Jasmine Z.

Description:

You are a fireman trying to rescue the crying baby, and take the baby back home!

Be careful with the falling lotus leaves, spikes that might came out, and enemies!

*Hint: You can kill the enemies by jumping on them, or toss the baby to attract the flying enemies’ attention!

Use arrow keys to move/jump, and "x" to toss the baby.
